description:
test/bench/shootout: pidigits is much faster
Also fix a bug in the script (s/runonly/run/)

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=288d68924d65 ***

test/bench/shootout: pidigits is much faster
Also fix a bug in the script (s/runonly/run/)

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6501051

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

On Tue, Aug 28, 2012 at 3:31 PM,  <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM
>
> keeps getter slower.  started at -50%, then -35%, now -20%.  :)

The 50% was a math error, the 35% a cut and paste error. The drugs are
taking their toll.

It's still faster than it used to be, and that's what matters.

-rob

what's with the large discrepancy between user and real time that exists
now but didn't in earlier pidigit runs?  real time is less than user... did
previous runs not have GOMAXPROCS > 1?

On Tue, Aug 28, 2012 at 2:23 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> Please take another look.
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**6501051/<http://codereview.appspot.com/6501051/>
>

LGTM

keeps getter slower.  started at -50%, then -35%, now -20%.  :)

https://codereview.appspot.com/6501051/diff/5001/test/bench/shootout/timing.log
File test/bench/shootout/timing.log (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6501051/diff/5001/test/bench/shootout/timing.log#newcode1070
test/bench/shootout/timing.log:1070: gc_B pidigits	2.88u 0.01s 2.90r # _21%
- not _

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Ha ha. Well spotted. Probably a cut and paste error?? I don't know.
Rerun and updated. User time was right.

-rob

subject: code review 6501051: test/bench/shootout: pidigits is much faster
